name: Survive The Dead Demo [Discontinued]
description:
A Short 30 Minute Demo of Survive The Dead, Survive The Dead Is A Zombie Survival Game With Elements L COD Zombies, There's Tons Of Guns To Help You Survive The Zombie Outbreak, There Are Power-ups That Make You Stronger, Faster, Control Time And More, There Are Easter Eggs To Hunt And Even A Story To Enjoy.Get Ready For Some Action Packed Zombie Killing.

 Early Access Will Be Live After Trailer Hits 200 Views It Will Cost $5 But Will Include All Future Updates And Extra Content.  After Early Access Price Will Change To $15, If You Donate  An Extra $5 You Can Request For Any Item To Be Added To The Game With Your Name And Emblem On It, So Please Help The Game By Donating [Discontinued]
